title: FS T206 Tinker and Evers SGC graded
author: Northviewcats

posts.post_title: FS T206 Tinker and Evers SGC graded
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have the following SGC graded cards for sale:

1909-11 Old Mill T206 Joe Tinker Bat Off Shoulder SGC 35
1909-11 Polar Bear T206 Johnny Evers SGC 30

Price: $115.00 each. Take them both for $210.00.

Shipping: $3.00

Payment: Paypal, check, or money order are all acceptable.

First response with a commitment to purchase gets the card.


Thanks for looking,

Joe
